caption: Column
description: The column object represents a column within a structured relational database or datastore table, which contains data that is able to be create, updated, deleted and queried.
name: column

created_time.description: The time when the column was known to have been created.

last_updated.description: The time when the column was known to have been created.

name.description: The column name, ordinarily as assigned by a database administrator.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the column.
